name: Ryan White HIV/AIDS Program
description: The Ryan White HIV/AIDS Program provides comprehensive care and support services for people living with HIV who are uninsured or underinsured, filling gaps in care not covered by other sources.
fullDescription: The Ryan White HIV/AIDS Program provides comprehensive care and support services for people living with HIV who are uninsured or underinsured, filling gaps in care not covered by other sources.
whatTheyOffer:
- Primary medical care and specialist visits
- HIV medications and treatment
- Mental health services
- Substance abuse treatment
- Case management
- Transportation to appointments
- Emergency financial assistance
- Housing assistance
howToGetIt: Contact your local Ryan White provider or AIDS service organization. You'll need proof of HIV diagnosis, residency, and income. Use the HIV care locator to find services near you.
keywords: Ryan White, HIV, AIDS, HIV medication, case management, uninsured, underinsured, housing assistance, HIV care
